title: Student Locked Out of Dorm Room
description: A student has left their key inside their dorm room and is locked out.

tasks.description: Identify the student and verify their room assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student's identity and that they live in the specified room.

tasks.description: Contact the Resident Advisor (RA) on duty for that building to let the student in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully contacts the RA and provides the student's details.

tasks.description: Inform the student that the RA is on their way to assist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the resolution to the student.
